special_text:
You may activate Era's abilities an additional time during your turn as long as you've cast another spell with mana value 5 or greater this turn.
[+1]: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
[-2]: You may play target artifact, creature or land card from your graveyard this turn.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, mill three cards, then you may put a permanent card from your graveyard or your hand onto the battlefield.”
